name: Facebook - Light Green
description:
These scripts are a hack from madebymat's script, "Facebook - pink!", which can be found here:

http://userstyles.org/styles/26493

The other colors I've made can be found at the following:

Light Blue: http://userstyles.org/styles/32414
Green: http://userstyles.org/styles/32421
Light Green: http://userstyles.org/styles/32420
Purple: http://userstyles.org/styles/32415
Light Purple: http://userstyles.org/styles/32416
Orange: http://userstyles.org/styles/32418
Red: http://userstyles.org/styles/32417
Teal: http://userstyles.org/styles/32413
Yellow: http://userstyles.org/styles/32419

Thanks again to madebymat for his original script.
